summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York transmitting transcript attachments dated 2019-07-19 and 2019-06-19. The document appears to be official correspondence related to the Epstein case, likely sharing evidentiary materials.

keyFacts: An Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York transmitted transcripts dated 2019-06-19 and 2019-07-19 via email on June 26, 2020.
The document is official correspondence related to the Epstein case, indicating ongoing legal proceedings or evidence sharing in mid-2020.
The email originated from the U.S. Attorney's Office at One Saint Andrew's Plaza in New York City.
